titleStmt.title: The conuerts first loue discerned iustified, left and recouered. Resoluing the truth of an effectuall conuersion. And informing the right way to perseverance and perfection. By Thomas Cooper.
titleStmt.author: Cooper, Thomas, fl. 1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by F. Kingston for William Welby, and are to bee sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the white Swanne,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the white Swanne
